description: In this course you will dive straight into the essentials of multimedia publishing for delivering and positioning new information products in multiple marketplaces. You will learn to structure web, video, graphic design and marketing materials that convert. Learn about info product planning, own media, earned media, paid media, info product copyright, digital packaging, virtual merchandising and distribution. The course includes 10 detailed video lessons with step by step instructions on how to build your info product project from the ground up. Unleash over 100 techniques and methods for rapid prototyping and assembling of complex web production chains. From concept to design and promotion this training course will help you develop an efficient workflow from a creative and technical management perspective.
title: Mastering Digital Product Publishing & Project Architecture
